cbinstall.name: JoomGallery
cbinstall.author: Armin Hornung-JoomGallery team
cbinstall.description: Provides some tabs for Community Builder for usage with JoomGallery. Be sure to publish the Plugin before usage. Then, you can configure, publish and unpublish each tab of it separately in the CB Tab Management.

param.name: showEmptyTab
param.label: Show empty Tab
param.description: Display the Gallery Tab even if the user has no pics uploaded

param.name: uploadLinkEnabled
param.label: Display Link to Joomgallery Userpanel for uploads
param.description: When visiting his own Usergallery, the user can be given a link to upload more pictures

param.name: showUserRating
param.label: Show overall user rating
param.description: Displays the overall rating of the user, averaged from all his votes.

param.name: showCategory
param.label: Display Category Path
param.description: Show the category path the picture is in under the title

param.name: categoryfilter
param.label: Display only from categories
param.description: Enter a comma-separated list of category-IDs to display only pictures from these categories (e.g. "1,5,6"). Leave empty (default) to show pictures from all categories. This option requires JoomGallery 1.0.1, 1.5, or later!

param.name: picsperpage
param.label: Pictures per Page
param.description: Leave empty (default) to use the setting from the JoomGallery component

param.name: numcols
param.label: Number of columns
param.description: Leave empty (default) to use the setting from the JoomGallery component

param.name: pagination
param.label: Display pagination (otherwise only first page)
param.description: Spreads the images over several pages. If disabled, only the first page will be displayed, containing the # of pics entered above

param.name: hidebackend
param.label: Hide images uploaded from Backend
param.description: If enabled, no pictures that were uploaded from the Admin backend are shown on the tab.
